H0.text: Technology is the example of the invention of the wheel, which has the goal of solving human problems.

H1.text: Industry is the example of the invention of the wheel that has the goal of solving human problems.

H2.text: Concept is an example of the invention of the wheel that has the goal of solving human problems.

H3.text: Evolution is the concept that the invention of the wheel exemplifies, as it has the goal of solving human problems.

A4.text: A wheel reduces friction by facilitating motion by rolling together with the use of axles.

A5.text: The invention of the wheel has also been important for technology in general, important applications including the water wheel, the cogwheel (see also antikythera mechanism), the spinning wheel, and the astrolabe or torquetum.
